See recommended resolution options?

conversation_flow.user_message: Yes, what's the best resolution to offer him?
conversation_flow.agent_response:

**Recommended Resolution:**

| Element | Details |

| Product | Audiophile Pro Headphones |
| Regular price | $349.99 |
| His price | $299.99 (15% loyalty discount) |
| Upgrade cost | +$50 |

**Option B: Full Refund**

| Element | Details |
|---------|--------|
| Amount | $249.99 |
| Method | Original payment (2-3 days) |
| Risk | May lose customer to competitor |

**Option C: Store Credit + Bonus**

| Element | Details |
|---------|--------|
| Credit amount | $249.99 |
| Bonus | +10% ($25 extra) |
| Total | $274.99 store credit |
| Validity | 12 months |

- Addresses his specific complaint (sound quality)
- Small upgrade cost shows value
- Keeps sale, builds loyalty
- 78% of similar customers accept this offer

Source: [Resolution Engine + Recommendation AI]
